main.description: Going through a Covid pandemic, I have a deeper feeling about how life is short. Thus I challenge myself with two areas that I always felt I don't have the ability to achieve before is that learning Chinese and approaching IT knowledge.
main.bio: Discovering myself through different roles in international environments, I would like to work in a company to applies technology and bring the best experience for the customer, especially for the young generation. I have got my best self to work as a motivated and goal-oriented professional. I am keen on learning new technologies and doing challenging tasks. I am very open-minded and have the skills to work on international projects. I am actively seeking a position remote in a strong and expanding company that appreciates the dedication, hard work, passions, and embraces positive change, and personal growth.
main.contactmessage: Hi, I am looking for a very fresh position in the IT company and support the customer. Especially, I would love to join a company with the model of remote working. Thank you in advance for any connections, advice, or opportunities you can offer. Hope to get your contact soon.

personal.text: The best way to find out if you can trust somebody is to trust them.

I am 30 years old, the age that most people probably think is very difficult to learn something and start a new job. Yeah, I am not an expert, much less a person with special abilities. I just want to be here and start sharing about the journey of an ordinary person, someone who longs to be able to stay anywhere where could bring happiness to me.
